title: Niue: Scenic Matavai Resort - Apartments
inclusions_evidence: INCLUSIONS: 7 nights accommodation & bonus offers as outlined. Return Airport transfers. IMPORTANT INFORMATION: International and domestic airfares are not included.

hotel.name_or_hint: Scenic Matavai Resort - Apartments (self-catering Standard Studio apartments)

items.label: Return airport transfers (not a DIY cost sourced)
Bonus offers as outlined (unspecified on page)

other.notes: No external pricing for hotel rooms, flights or transfers was retrieved. DIY prices could not be reliably obtained from booking engines within this assessment.

reasoning: Cannot verify DIY pricing because external booking site prices were not sourced. The package offers 7 nights plus return airport transfers for 1792 total for two (pp 896) and excludes international/domestic airfares. Given inclusion of transfers and the remote Niue location, the deal appears reasonable value, but absence of flight pricing and unspecified 'bonus offers' prevents confirming concrete savings.
additional_notes: To confirm this as a top-10 saving, obtain hotel room-rate quotes for a 7-night studio and roundtrip flights to Niue for two from booking platforms (e.g., Booking.com, Expedia, and airline sites) and compare totals. Also clarify what the 'bonus offers' include.
